snippet.title: MLB SLAM! - N-Gage - Gameplay
snippet.description:
27:54 Grand Slam
26:00 Home Run
The game is good, but has real technical issues. As you can hear, the audio often stops for no reason. There is screen tearing as the view scrolls around the field and it skips/misses frames of animation, which is very off putting.
